hanzi-su-wiki:
斜

Значения

Косой, наклонный; неправильный

Мнемоника

Бедняк 余 в мерку для зерна 斗 подсыпает шелухи, чтобы его казалось бы больше.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xié
inclined; slanting; oblique; tilting
наклонный; косой; косой; наклон
rtega_mnemonic:
斜斜RSslanting, sloping, inclined
  • someone carrying 余 a measure 斗 under his arm: he can not hold it upright: inclined
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 正
Pictophonetic: 余 indicates the sound; 斗 (measuring cup) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
倾斜 [ qīng xié ]: to incline; to lean; to slant; to slope; to tilt
斜坡 [ xié pō ]: slope; incline
斜阳 [ xié yáng ]: setting sun
歪斜 [ wāi xié ]: crooked; askew; oblique; slanting; out of plumb
斜眼 [ xié yǎn ]: to look askance; cross or wall-eyed
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 余 [ yú ] surplus, remainder; surname
    • 斗 [ dòu ] to struggle, to fight, to contend; measuring cup
heisig_chinese_memo: The main bar of an old-fashioned scale(balance) will be slanting if you place a giant measuring cup on one side.
heisig_constituent: diagonal, scales, too much, umbrella, potato, small, mmeasuring cup, big dipper, The Plough, drop, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: The main bar of an old-fashioned scale(balance) will be very diagonal if you place a giant measuring cup on one side.
koohiiStory2: The constellation of libra (meaning " scales" in latin) is diagonal to the handle of the big dipper.
jp_example_words:
傾斜(けいしゃ): inclination, slant, slope, bevel, list, dip
斜面(しゃめん): slope, slanting surface, bevel
斜(はす): aslant, oblique, diagonal
斜め(ななめ): obliqueness
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have a surplus of ladles laid out diagonally in front of you. Why are they diagonal? And why do you have so many ladles? Why the surplus? Hang on, we'll get there.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at all these ladles lying diagonally in front of you. Pick them up. Feel the wood grain. Wonder why you have so many.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In front of this diagonal pattern is a shaman (しゃ) who is currently staring at you. You slowly reach down and turn one of the ladles around, diagonally, and look back up. The shaman's eyes are wide, and now they're scribbling on in a notebook.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Uh oh, is this one of those weird tests where they find out if you're the chosen one or some old scholar reincarnated? Who know laying ladles at diagonal angles could reveal this kinda stuff?!
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 斗 (ковш), 禾 (ость колоса)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the surplus (余) from the Big Dipper (斗) looks diagonal
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The main bar of an old-fashioned scale(balance) will be slanting if you place a giant measuring cup on one side.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " fight ", the sound of " Yu " means the weaving shuttle, which often means skewed. "Said Wen": "Zhou Ye. Congdou, Yu Sheng. Reading Ruo Tu." Duan Yucai's note: "Shu each book from the wood. Jinzheng. The hand said: "The expresser, the sorrow. Yeah. "Everything that comes out of fighting is called slanting. So the word is from fighting." "Yu Pian‧ Doubu": "Slanting, not correct." Tang Hanyu "Nanshan Poems": "Or slanting and not leaning, or relaxation But not."

" Slanting " also means moving away from the center or straight ahead. Han Jiayi's "Sai Niao Fu": "Shan Jia's year old, April Meng Xia, Geng Zi day oblique, and the house is set."

" Slanting " also refers to extending forward sideways or tortuously. Emperor Liang Jianwen of the Southern Dynasties "Xingyu Mountain Inscription": "Yuxiu Kaihua, Zishui backslanted."

Inclined placement can also be " oblique ". Song Linbu's "Miscellaneous" third: "The red persimmons are harvested from the late trees on the ladder, and white fish are caught in the cold current."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " fight ", the sound of " Yu " means the weaving shuttle, which often means skewed.
humanum_full_description:
從「斗」，「余」聲，表示織布的梭子，今常表示歪斜。《說文》：「杼也。从斗，余聲。讀若荼。」段玉裁注：「抒各本从木。今正。手部曰：『抒者，挹也。挹者，抒也。』凡以斗挹出之謂之斜。故字从斗。」《玉篇‧斗部》：「斜，不正也。」 唐韓愈〈南山詩〉：「或斜而不倚，或弛而不彀。」

　　「斜」也表示向偏離正中或正前方的方向移動。漢賈誼〈鵩鳥賦〉：「單閼之歲兮，四月孟夏，庚子日斜兮，鵩集予舍。」

　　「斜」還指側斜或曲折地向前延伸。南朝梁簡文帝〈行雨山銘〉：「玉岫開華，紫水迴斜。」

　　傾側放置亦可以「斜」表示。宋林逋〈雜興〉之三：「梯斜晚樹收紅柿，筒直寒流得白魚。」
humanum_short_description: 從「斗」，「余」聲，表示織布的梭子，今常表示歪斜。

從「 斗 」，「 余 」聲，表示織布的梭子，今常表示歪斜。《說文》：「杼也。从斗，余聲。讀若荼。」段玉裁注：「抒各本从木。今正。手部曰：『抒者，挹也。挹者，抒也。』凡以斗挹出之謂之斜。故字从斗。」《玉篇‧斗部》：「斜，不正也。」 唐韓愈〈南山詩〉：「或斜而不倚，或弛而不彀。」 「 斜 」也表示向偏離正中或正前方的方向移動。漢賈誼〈鵩鳥賦〉：「單閼之歲兮，四月孟夏，庚子日斜兮，鵩集予舍。」 「 斜 」還指側斜或曲折地向前延伸。南朝梁簡文帝〈行雨山銘〉：「玉岫開華，紫水迴斜。」 傾側放置亦可以「 斜 」表示。宋林逋〈雜興〉之三：「梯斜晚樹收紅柿，筒直寒流得白魚。」
From " fight", the sound of " Yu" means the weaving shuttle, which often means skewed. "Said Wen": "Zhou Ye. Congdou, Yu Sheng. Reading Ruo Tu." Duan Yucai's note: "Shu each book from the wood. Jinzheng. The hand said: "The expresser, the sorrow. Yeah. "Everything that comes out of fighting is called slanting. So the word is from fighting." "Yu Pian‧ Doubu": "Slanting, not correct." Tang Hanyu "Nanshan Poems": "Or slanting and not leaning, or relaxation But not." " Slanting" also means moving away from the center or straight ahead. Han Jiayi's "Sai Niao Fu": "Shan Jia's year old, April Meng Xia, Geng Zi day oblique, and the house is set." " Slanting" also refers to extending forward sideways or tortuously. Emperor Liang Jianwen of the Southern Dynasties "Xingyu Mountain Inscription": "Yuxiu Kaihua, Zishui backslanted." Inclined placement can also be " oblique". Song Linbu's "Miscellaneous" third: "The red persimmons are harvested from the late trees on the ladder, and white fish are caught in the cold current."

斜字的基本解释

斜
xié
不正，跟平面或直线既不平行也不垂直的：斜坡。斜面。斜度。斜线。斜视。

斜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》似嗟切，平麻，邪。］
(1)不正；歪斜。
(2)挹，酌。
(3)向偏离正中或正前方的方向移动。
(4)指侧斜或曲折地向前延伸。
(5)倾侧放置。
(6)委婉。
(7)同“邪”。不正当，不正派。
(8)同“邪”。不专诚。
(9)同“邪”。邪气。中医指能伤人致病的不正之气。
(10)同“邪”。指邪魔。
(11)指山坡野地。多用于地名。
(12)量词。表名物之量，相当于“个”或“套”。
[②]［yé］
［《廣韻》以遮切，平麻，以。］
终南山山谷名。在陕西省褒城县东北。
[③]［chá］
［《集韻》直加切，平麻，澄。］
人名用字。伊稚斜，汉代匈奴单于名。

斜字的英文翻译

◎ 斜
inclined, oblique, slanting, tilted

斜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斗字部】　斜； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页478第15
【唐韻】似嗟切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徐嗟切，?音邪。【說文】抒也。【玉篇】散也，不正也。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】枝牚杈枒而斜據。　又【集韻】【韻會】余遮切【正韻】于遮切，?音耶。梁州谷名。在武功西南。【前漢·揚雄傳】西自褒斜。【註】南山谷名也。【班固·西都賦】右界褒斜，隴首之險。【註】梁州記曰：萬石城泝漢，上七里有褒谷。南口曰褒，北口曰斜。長四百七十里。　又【集韻】時遮切，音闍。伊雅斜，單于名。　又直加切，音秅。義同。

斜字的源字形

斜字的起名意思

倾斜，如斜阳，斜照。

oblique
Basic explanation of words
oblique
xié
Wrong, neither parallel nor perpendicular to a plane or straight line: slope. Incline. Slope. Slash. Squint.
oblique
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xié］
["Guangyun" is like a cut, plain hemp, evil. ]
(1) Incorrect; skewed.
(2) Yi, discretion.
(3) Move in a direction that deviates from the center or straight ahead.
(4) Refers to extending forward sideways or tortuously.
(5) Place it on its side.
(6) Euphemism.
(7) Same as "evil". Improper, improper.
(8) Same as "evil". Not conscientious.
(9) Same as "evil". Evil spirits. Chinese medicine refers to unhealthy qi that can hurt people and cause illness.
(10) Same as "evil". Refers to demons.
(11) Refers to the hillside field. Mostly used for place names.
(12) Quantifiers. The quantity of a name is equivalent to "piece" or "set".
[②]［yé］
["Guangyun" to cover cutting, plain hemp, to. ]
The name of the Zhongnan Mountain valley. In the northeast of Baocheng County, Shaanxi Province.
[③] [chá]
["Jiyun" straight cut, plain hemp, clear. ]
Use characters for names. Yizhixie, the Xiongnu in the Han Dynasty was single in name.
oblique
English translation of words
◎ Oblique
inclined, oblique, slanting, tilted
oblique
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Dou Zi Department] 　 oblique; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 478 15
【Tang Yun】Similar to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Xu Su cut,? Yin Xie. [Said the text] Express also. [Jade articles] Disperse, not correct. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】The branches and branches are obliquely based.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Zheqie [Zhengyun] Yu Zheqie,? Yin Ye. Liangzhou valley name. In the southwest of Wugong. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Xi Zi praises. [Note] The name of the South Valley is also. [Ban Gu·Xi Du Fu] The right boundary is praised, and the risk of Longshou is in danger. [Note] Liangzhou Ji said: Wanshicheng traces back to Han, and there is Baogu in Shangqili. The south mouth says praise, and the north mouth says oblique. Four hundred and seventy miles long.　[Jiyun] Shizhaqi, Yincha. Yiya obliquely, single in name.　 Cut straight and cut again, sound. The same meaning.
oblique

oblique
Name meaning
Oblique, like slanting sun, oblique light.
斜
会意字。从斗,斗是古代的一种勺;从余,余通餘,表示有多余就留出。本义是舀出。常用义是不正、倾斜。
不正;歪:一线|~坡「歪~。
~边 ~度~高 ~晖 ~角~井 ~楞 ~路
~率 ~面 ~睨 ~射,~视 ~纹 ~眼 ~阳
~照 打~ 横~ ゼ~ 倾~一溜歪~
xié
斜斜。
篆
косой
Зная слово.
Congdou, Dou - это своего рода ложка в древние времена; Congyu и Yu Tongyu указывают на то, что есть избыток и отложенный.
Первоначальное значение - вычерпать.
Общие значения не являются праведными и косвенными.
Неправильно; криво: линия | ~ по "изогнута ~".
~ край ~ градус ~ высокий ~ хуэй ~ угол ~ колодец ~ звук ~ дорога

xié
1) косой, наклонный; диагональный; косоугольный; косо, наклонно; наискосок; по диагонали; склоняться, наклоняться, крениться; покоситься; скашивать, делать косым; наклонять
斜雨 косой дождь
斜插 вставить наискось (косо); сделать вставку (напр. в рукопись)
斜三角形 косоугольный треугольник
斜着眼睛看人 косо смотреть на людей
他斜了我一眼 он покосился на меня
斜着身子坐下 сесть наклонившись (подавшись корпусом в сторону)
日已西斜 солнце уже склонилось к западу
2) геол. моноклинный, клино-
斜黝帘石 моноклинный цоизит, клиноцоизит
3) Се (фамилия)
Radicals: 余, 斗  (surplus, ladle)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have a surplus of ladles laid out diagonally in front of you. Why are they diagonal? And why do you have so many ladles? Why the surplus? Hang on, we'll get there.
Look at all these ladles lying diagonally in front of you. Pick them up. Feel the wood grain. Wonder why you have so many.
Reading Mnemonic
In front of this diagonal pattern is a shaman (しゃ) who is currently staring at you. You slowly reach down and turn one of the ladles around, diagonally, and look back up. The shaman's eyes are wide, and now they're scribbling on in a notebook.
Uh oh, is this one of those weird tests where they find out if you're the chosen one or some old scholar reincarnated? Who know laying ladles at diagonal angles could reveal this kinda stuff?!
